title: How to Make a Lentil Nut Loaf

steps.headline: Cook the onion in a frying pan gently until clear and soft.
Combine the remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
steps.description: Add the cooked onion and mix gently.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a loaf tin that has been greased or lined.
steps.description: Pat down firmly. Sprinkle the sesame seeds over the top.

steps.headline: Bake for 30 minutes, covered with foil or a baking sheet/tray.
Remove the foil or baking sheet/tray for a further 10 minutes (40 minutes total cooking timer).
Remove from the oven.
steps.description: Serve warm with steamed vegetables on the side.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF (180ºC).  Cook the onion in a frying pan gently until clear and soft. Do not brown. Combine the remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Add the cooked onion and mix gently. Pour the mixture into a loaf tin that has been greased or lined. Pat down firmly. Sprinkle the sesame seeds over the top. Bake for 30 minutes, covered with foil or a baking sheet/tray.  Remove the foil or baking sheet/tray for a further 10 minutes (40 minutes total cooking timer).  Remove from the oven. Serve warm with steamed vegetables on the side.
